doc.title: New York Undercover

credit.role: George Clinton and the P-Funk All-Stars
Officer Ruelas 'If this world were mine'

doc.plot: Eddie Torres and 'J.C.' Williams are two detectives of the 4th precinct of New York City. In their job they fight against the worst of the society infiltrated like the bandits who try to stop. Helped by his superior, Lt. Cooper, and by their buddies Tommy McNamara and Nina Moreno, all together try to clean the streets of the criminal plague what invade the city.
